doc.title: Dynamic typing

value.content: Dynamically-typed languages are those (like JavaScript) where the interpreter assigns variables a type at runtime based on the variable's value at the time.

value.title: See also
value.content:
• JavaScript data types and data structures
  • Type system on Wikipedia
